name: Anime Memes
description:
You continue your journey in the history of Memes, fulfill all the conditions, catch enemies, kill bosses, collect memes, dodge traps. Can you pass without death? We will see.


Anime Memes - A humorous anime game where you have to destroy enemies, complete quests, and just have fun.

Features:

  • Unique posters
  • New weapons
  • New beautiful hat
  • Detailed map
  • Unique transport
  • Elements of horror with memes

P.S. Each player, after passing the game, has a chance to get a reward from the developers!
